B2V InmobiliariA sells exclusively. Enrique Vallinas Lazaro Pablo Batres Fantastic villa in Miraflores de la Sierra of traditional construction, with impressive views of the San Pedro hill and the Guadalix valley. The house is divided into three floors: Main floor -Large living room with fireplace and access to the terrace -Large kitchen in rustic style and with access to the terrace -3 rooms, 1 of which currently serves as an office and the other 2 are bedrooms, one of which incorporates an en-suite bathroom with a shower. -2 full bathrooms with shower, one in the room and the other that serves the rest of the floor top floor -2 large rooms -full bathroom with bathtub lower floor -Large garage for several vehicles and direct access to the house -Small kitchen ideal for meetings and celebrations in the lower part and in the garden. -Large room currently dedicated to a living room with a small cellar, perfect for your celebrations and family gatherings. The house is heated with gas heating, we have PVC windows with Climalit with thermal break. The rooms have fitted wardrobes, dressed inside. MIRAFLORES OF THE SIERRA Spanish municipality in the north of the Community of Madrid. It is located 49 km from Madrid, on a south-facing slope of the Central System. The highways and paths of the ports of Canencia and La Morcuera start from the town. Famous for its fountains, Miraflores has excellent recreational areas to enjoy all its splendor, such as the Fuente del Cura or the San Blas humilladero. As far as the center is concerned, we can walk through it and discover some of the most representative buildings and symbols such as the Plaza del Álamo, one of the areas with the greatest commercial and gastronomic activity. Next is the church, a temple consecrated to the Assumption of Our Lady, the first temple dates from the 15th century and during the following centuries successive extensions and modifications have been carried out, in addition to the Town Hall and the building of the house of culture. It has a bus line that connects this municipality with others around it and with the Plaza de Castilla Interchange. Line 725: Madrid (Plaza de Castilla)-Miraflores-Bustarviejo-Valdemanco Enrique Vallinas Lazaro Pablo Batres Do not miss the video that is included in the publication For more information or to make a visit, get in touch.

IFRALA real estate sells in Miraflores de la Sierra a great duplex located in the urban area. Central, spacious, bright, with an elegant terrace with beautiful views of the most picturesque street in the town and in the middle of the Madrid mountains just 40 minutes from the big city. On the first floor we find a large fully furnished kitchen, office area and a covered and glazed terrace very comfortable to use as a pantry clothesline where the gas heating boiler is located. We continue on the first floor with a bedroom, full bathroom and a very large, bright and well-distributed living room, from which, going up an elegant spiral staircase, we access the second floor. description: Beautiful House in Miraflores de la Sierra Engel & Völkers presents this spectacular house in Miraflores de la Sierra. The main floor welcomes us with its spacious living room, designed to enjoy life in company. The social area is perfect for sharing unforgettable moments with family and friends, while the reading and relaxation area, with fireplace, is the ideal place to disconnect from the daily hustle and bustle. The dining room with large windows, stunning views, with capacity for important meetings and dinners along with a large kitchen, comfortable, and very bright complete this noble area of the house.  The first floor has a wonderful living room and several bedrooms, ideal for creating a relaxing space or to accommodate your guests in total comfort. The second floor, independent is spectacular, with a great hall that will lead you to the master bedroom. This has a balcony that offers beautiful views and a sitting area where you can enjoy unique moments. The bathroom is beautiful, with high quality finishes that will make you feel like in a spa. The porch and the dreamlike garden are perfect to enjoy the outdoors and nature in a private and quiet environment. The house has a great pool, ideal for cooling off on summer days and enjoy unique moments with your family. The wine cellar is perfect to store your best wines and do wine tastings with your friends. The house has 10 bedrooms and 6 bathrooms, offering plenty of space to accommodate your family and friends in total comfort. In addition, it has a house for storage, which will allow you to have a personalized service at all times. Miraflores de la Sierra is a Spanish municipality located in the autonomous community of Madrid, north of the capital. This town is located in the heart of the Sierra de Guadarrama and is known for its natural beauty and tranquility. Below are some important aspects about its services, transportation, education and tourism: Services: Miraflores de la Sierra has a wide range of services for its inhabitants and visitors, including supermarkets, stores, restaurants, bars, pharmacies, health centers, and post offices. It also has a library, a house of culture, and a sports center. Transport: the most convenient way to reach Miraflores de la Sierra is by car, as it is about 45 minutes by car from the center of Madrid. It is also possible to arrive by public transport, using the intercity bus lines that connect the town with other nearby municipalities. Education: in terms of education, Miraflores de la Sierra has several schools, including public and private schools, and a high school. It also has a music and dance school for the youngest children. Tourism: is a town that attracts many tourists due to its natural beauty and its offer of outdoor activities. Some of the most outstanding places to visit include the Ermita de la Virgen de la Peña, the Parque Regional de la Cuenca Alta del Manzanares, and the Mirador de la Najarra. There are also various activities such as hiking, mountain biking, and skiing in winter. In addition, it has a wide range of accommodation, including hotels, rural houses and tourist apartments.

description: Discover our new development, La Finca de los Pinarejos, your new home in the northern mountains of Madrid! Our single-family home project comes with exceptional quality and unmatched accessibility.The first phase, with 58 homes with 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. An innovative and modern design has been chosen, making it the perfect option for your main residence.The homes have a fitted kitchen, aerothermal system, private garden and swimming pool (optional). description: EXCLUSIVE HOMES & PROPERTIES REAL ESTATE, SL.We offer you an excellent independent one-story villa with 1000 meters of plot.Completely renovated in 2008.And updated and expanded in 2019. ******The house has 120 meters according to the cadastre, plus 40 meters in enclosures.****** *In other buildings within the plot there are 70 more meters.(storage room or solar panel battery space, tool house, Chill out area, barbecue area, solar shower, garage space). *******Total between housing and other constructions there are 230 useful meters.On a plot of 1000 meters ******* The distribution of the house is: Four bedrooms (three of them with built-in wardrobes), two bathrooms (one en suite), two living rooms, a dining room and a kitchen.Built-in wardrobes, air conditioning, heating, high quality, recently updated and ready to move into. One of the living rooms and the dining room next to the kitchen are modern enclosure constructions.The house has also been treated with an injected insulation (rock wool), so the enclosure spaces maintain the same temperature as the rest of the house. Both living rooms of the house have modern fireplaces. The entire house is a modern and pleasant space, ready to enter. This property has several peculiarities: the house is completely energy efficient, it has 22 solar panels (Total 10 Kilowatts) plus a storage battery bank (another 10 Kilowatts).Currently you pay 0 euros in energy costs.All electric. On the plot there are several buildings such as the storage room or space for the solar panel batteries, the tool house, the Chill out area, the barbecue area, solar shower, and garage space. In addition to the garden and the tree area where the centuries-old olive tree stands out, there is also a fish pond with its own biodiversity where there are also frogs and local birds come to rest. This property is a unique space that invites calm and a way of life in permanent contact with nature. In addition, the Community only pays 70 euros per month, which includes being a co-owner of the Endrinales Club, which has a semi-Olympic swimming pool, picnic area, bar-restaurant, social rooms (movie room, meeting room and library), gym, tennis court. tennis, soccer field and multipurpose sports court. In the Endrinals de Miraflores de la Sierra urbanization there are also a chapel. The Los Endrinals urbanization also has maintenance and concierge personnel.These expenses are also included in the 70 euros paid per month for the community.(The community of owners of the urbanization that includes the club pays a quarterly fee).
